  • Method Details

    • onActionAddPart

      public void onActionAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method displays the add part form. It displays an error if no part is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Add part form button event
      Throws:
      IOException - FXMLLoader IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      The initialize method sets up part and product tables. It also creates prompt text for the part and product text fields.

    • onActionExit

      public void onActionExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method exits the program.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Exit button event

    • onActionModifyPart

      public void onActionModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Displays the modify part menu. Displays error if no part is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Modify part form button event
      Throws:
      IOException - FXMLLoader IOException

    • onActionDeletePart

      public void onActionDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a selected part from inventory. It also displays confirmation message before deletion.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Delete part button event

    • onActionAddProduct

      public void onActionAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method displays the add product form.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Add product form button event
      Throws:
      IOException - FXMLLoader IOException

    • onActionModifyProduct

      public void onActionModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method displays the modify product form. It also displays an error if no product is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Modify product button event
      Throws:
      IOException - FXMLLoader IOException

    • onActionDeleteProduct

      public void onActionDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a product from the inventory. It also displays a confirmation message before deletion.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Delete product button event

    • onActionSearchParts

      public void onActionSearchParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method searches the part table and displays or highlights the searched item. If nothing is found a window will display saying nothing found.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Search parts button event

    • onActionSearchProducts

      public void onActionSearchProducts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method searches the product table and displays or highlights the searched item. RUNTIME ERROR: When I used the lookupProduct method with parameter ID, I kept getting a nullPointerException. I fixed this issue when I realized a null object was getting added to my products lists. Instead of checking if products.size() == 0, I changed it to products.get(0) == null
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Search products button event
